# rounded(_:)

**Instance Method**

A vector formed by rounding each lane of the source vector to an integral value according to the specified rounding `rule`.

## Declaration

```swift
func rounded(_ rule: FloatingPointRoundingRule) -> Self
```
title: rounded(_:)
